entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nicolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:28 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nicolet 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -18.4°C
Wind: W 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
